changelog:
- Updated LegionOS to 1.5
- Merged June Security Patch
- Kernel Upstream to 4.9.181
- Fix camera-daemon cpuset
- Disable ALMK and PPR on all targets
- CustomTextClock: Set Text color based on wallpaper
- Q Style Clock:Set Its to accent color instead of gold or yellow color
- Added Smartron Srt Official Support
- Added New Bootanimation thanks to Androbuddy007
 - Updated Prebuilt Apps
 - Added toggle for lockscreen weather
 -Aggressive Battery:fix auto enable on battery saver
 - Use wireless charging animation for wired
